title: Pet Subjects: How can I get my fat cat to do more exercise?
text:
Dear Pete

I keep my two-year-old cat indoors all the time, but she’s getting fat and I worry that she isn’t getting enough exercise. I have an indoor cat gym but she just lies around on it, and she barely gets out of breath when I use toys to play with her. How can I get her to burn up more calories?

ND, Liverpool

Dear ND

Feline obesity is increasingly common, leading to serious illnesses and shorter lives, so it’s good that you’re tackling this early. Talk to your vet about her nutrition to make sure that you aren’t overfeeding her, and consider a novel type of exercise regime for cats: the Cazami Cat Wheel.
